title: France panorama. [No. 70/45]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The passing scene - the Nobel Physics Prize. 2. Women in the news - shepherdesses; Janou Lefebvre and her horse “Rocket” world jumping champions. 3. At the service of industry - the Central Electrical Industry Laboratory. 4. The arts - The Dignimont Exhibition at the Galliera Museum; the Baschet-Brothers “Sound Sculptures” and the Sucy-en-Brie Pedagogical Experiment.
